dcterms:creator: R. Goyal
S. E. Kahou
V. Michalski
J. Materzynska
S. Westphal
H. Kim
V. Haenel
I. Fruend
P. Yianilos
M. Mueller-Freitag
dcterms:description: A dataset focusing on temporal modeling with various scenes and objects in each action category, requiring models to focus on temporal variations among video frames.
dcterms:title: Something-Something V1

dcterms:creator: F. Mahdisoltani
G. Berger
W. Gharbieh
D. Fleet
R. Memisevic
dcterms:description: An extension of the Something-Something dataset focusing on temporal modeling with a larger number of videos and action categories.
dcterms:title: Something-Something V2

dcterms:creator: J. Carreira
A. Zisserman
dcterms:description: A large-scale dataset containing 400 human action classes, with at least 400 video clips for each category, focusing on action recognition.
dcterms:title: Kinetics
